Summary: Core RAG System - Knowledge Query and Response
Creator: Miles Waite
Description:
Foundation RAG functionality to answer Vena questions from knowledge base.

This epic covers the core retrieval augmented generation system that enables
users to ask questions about Vena concepts, configurations, and troubleshooting
in natural language and receive accurate, cited responses.

Phase: Phase 1 (Months 1-2)
Priority: Critical

Creator: Miles Waite
Description: This epic covers all GDPR compliance requirements for the FCS RAG Bot system, as outlined in the GDPR Compliance Business Requirements Document. The requirements are organized into three phases: Phase 1 (Critical), Phase 2 (High Priority), and Phase 3 (Medium Priority). Reference: GDPR/GDPR_COMPLIANCE_BUSINESS_REQUIREMENTS.md
